name: The legend of the Laurea
description:
A  RPG videogame that is a gift for the graduation of a beloved one.

Explore the city of Bologna, collect the items and talk with the friends you meet and defeat the ProfessOne.

Every charachter in the game is a friend that left a peculiar note of wishes.

Language: italian

PS: The game is self referential, with jokes known only to the people close to the protagonist...but still i thought it was nice to share (:

-

If you're playing on your PC:

A button = Z key

B button  = X key

arrow keys to move
